sentences.en: Factoring in foregone experience and missed opportunities to develop skills, research shows that workers unemployed as young adults earn lower wages for many years following joblessness.
sentences.cn: 调查显示，由于年轻人之前的经历，再加上错过了发展技能的机会，因此失业的年轻人在失业之后的许多年里，他们的收入也会相对较低。

sentences.en: Further proliferation and nuclear terrorism are not foregone conclusions.
sentences.cn: 进一步扩散与核恐怖主义不是注定要发生的事情.

sentences.en: If the result seems a foregone conclusion, people switch off.
sentences.cn: 如果比赛似乎将要发展成赛前预料的结局, 很多观众将选择关掉电视机.

sentences.en: It was a foregone conclusion that I would end up in the same business as him.
sentences.cn: 早已注定我最终会和他干同一行。

sentences.en: It's a foregone conclusion that we'll have a bumper harvest this year.
It's almost a foregone conclusion that you'll get what you want.
sentences.cn: 你将得到你想要的，这几乎是确定无疑的。

sentences.en: Most voters believe the result is a foregone conclusion.
sentences.cn: 多数投票者认为这个结果是意料之中的。

sentences.en: That no positive outcome can be expected is but a foregone conclusion.
sentences.cn: 难以期待会有积极成果,而只是过时的结论.

sentences.en: The championship result was almost a foregone conclusion.
sentences.cn: 锦标赛的结果差不多在意料之中。

sentences.en: The opportunity cost is value of the best foregone alternative.
sentences.cn: 机会成本就是已经成为过去的最好的可能性.

sentences.en: The outcome is a foregone conclusion.
The outcome of theelection is a foregone conclusion.
sentences.cn: 选举结果已在预料之中.

sentences.en: The outcome of this football game is a foregone conclusion.
sentences.cn: 这场足球赛,谁胜谁负已成定局.

sentences.en: This version rehabilitate the safe flaw in foregone earlier version.
sentences.cn: 本版本修复了已知的较早版本中的安全漏洞.

sentences.en: To foregone systematic flaw, want to insist to be able to fill.
sentences.cn: 对于已知的系统漏洞, 要坚持能补则补.

sentences.en: When all a foregone conclusion, I pray for what.
sentences.cn: 当一切都是预料中的结局, 我还恳求什么.

words.tran_cn: 发生在…之前；走在…之前（forego的ing形式）
过去的；先前的；预知的；预先决定的

phrases.tran_cn: 预料之中必然发生的事情；不可避免的结局

trans.tran_cn: （在位置时间或程度方面）走在…之前，居先( forego的过去分词 )
